channel.title: N-Gram on Miss Vidhyalakshmi Parthasarathy
channel.description: Recent content in N-Gram on Miss Vidhyalakshmi Parthasarathy

item.title: Project 13: NLP - Distributional Semantics Implementation of the Corpus Data with Sampling Methods
item.description: This project covers the distributional semantics to investigate how some words in the English language changed over the course of the last two centuries 2000 and 2010 using a private Corpus of Historical American English (COHA) dataset. The project explores and implements various sampling methods as listed below: N-Gram CBOW SkipGram Word2Vec Tools & Technologies: Python (nltk, word2vec, pandas, numpy, matplotlib), GitHub
